snippet: The authorities questioned whether guards had helped the prisoners, who were facing terrorism charges, escape.
abstract: Twenty-five suspects held on terrorism charges, some facing the death penalty, escaped from Iraqi prison north of Baghdad, killing two guards; separately, Iranians working on gas pipeline and three Iraqis are killed by gunmen in Diyala Province.
lead_paragraph: The authorities questioned whether guards had helped the prisoners, who were facing terrorism charges, escape.

headline.print_headline: Iraq: Day of Violence Includes Prison Break and Pipeline Shooting
